title: Maniya-AI
description: A personalized AI model trained with Manishka's personal data. Live demo integrated on website
longDescription: A web-based AI chat interface that provides information about Manishka using Google's Gemini AI model. This application allows users to ask questions and receive responses about personal information, professional experience, and preferences.

title: TravelMate
longDescription: TravelMate, is a travel planning application.  It uses an AI model (built with Python) to analyze user input regarding their ideal trip and destination. Based on this input, the AI determines the user's travel personality and generates a personalized itinerary tailored to their preferences.  The application uses React JS for the front-end and PHP for the back-end functionality.  A key feature is its ability to create custom itineraries based on predicted travel personality.

title: Football League Manager
description: An android app for managing football leagues
longDescription: Football League Manager is an Android application built with Kotlin and Jetpack Compose. It allows users to search for football clubs, view club and league information, and manage football leagues using a local database. The app uses TheSportsDB API for live football club data and stores league data from a bundled JSON file.
